alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 12:27AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT IRON AND CENTRAL ASHLAND COUNTIES... At 1227 AM CST, heavy snow showers were along a line extending from near Gurney, to near Saxon, to 6 miles southeast of Upson, and moving southeast at 30 mph. Visibilities of 1/4 mile or less and wind gusts up to 35 mph are expected with these heavy snow showers. These heavy snow showers will be near... Saxon, Gurney, and Upson around 1230 AM CST. Turtle Flambeau Flowage around 1245 AM CST. Mercer around 1250 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these heavy snow showers include Kimball, Van Buskirk, Marble Point, Saxon Harbor, Gile Flowage, Manitowish, Cedar, Island Lake Iron County, Pence, and Iron Belt. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter of a mile in these heavy snow showers. Be prepared for changing visibility and road conditions. Reduce your speed and allow more space between you and the vehicle in front of you.
